name: Vigilant Phantom
text: Your phantom is highly observant, and its link with you increases your own watchfulness.
benefit: While your phantom is within your reach, you gain a +4 bonus on Perception checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Perception, this bonus increases to +8. This doesn’t apply if your phantom is helpless or unconscious.
text_zh: 你的魅影十分警觉，与它的联系能够增加你自身的警惕性。
benefit_zh: 当你的魅影位于你的触及范围内时，你会在察觉检定上获得+4加值。若你在察觉技能上投入了10点或更多技能点的话，该加值会增加至+8点。如果你的魅影陷入无助（helpless）或昏迷（unconscious）的话，该效果就无法生效。
